mapper.select: SELECT max(label_id) label_id,ques_id FROM `tb_ques_label_relation` group by ques_id

SELECT q.ques_id, q.ques, q.source, q.sourceUrl, q.create_time, q.scene, a.answer_id, a.answer FROM tb_ques q, tb_answer a WHERE q.answer_id = a.answer_id ORDER BY q.create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex},1
SELECT * FROM `tb_ques` where datediff(date(now()),date(create_time)) <= #{day} order by create_time desc

SELECT q.ques_id, q.ques, q.answer_id, q.create_time, q.update_time, q.memory_level, q.last_view, q.high_light
FROM tb_ques q
RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT r.ques_id FROM tb_ques_label_relation r WHERE label_id in ( SELECT l.label_id FROM tb_label l WHERE l.label_name = #{p.labelName} ) ) t ON q.ques_id = t.ques_id
where 1=1
and q.ques like concat("%",#{p.content},"%")
and datediff(now(),q.create_time) < #{p.recentDay}
order by q.high_light desc,create_time desc
